name: Plight of the Bird
description:
Plight of the Bird is a 2D platforming game where you play as a blue bird trying to get back to his home of the Golden Apples. Each stage is vertically built, simulating the bird's ascent back home, overcoming the challenge of daunting heights. 

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, space key to jump.

Concept: Michelle Zhang
Level designs: Michelle Zhang
Sprite/artwork: Michelle Zhang
Mechanic code: Michael Baker
